statements: SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT theme FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT language,timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY theme DESC;
SELECT theme, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT user_id, theme, language, timezone FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark' AND language = 'english';
SELECT theme, COUNT(*) AS Count FROM user_preferences GROUP BY theme;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE theme IN ('light', 'dark') ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT language FROM user_preferences WHERE timezone = 'GMT';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_name FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY preference_name DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_interactions > 5
SELECT user_id, MAX(interaction_date) AS last_interaction_date FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click'
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY preference_name ASC, preference_value DESC
SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_info WHERE email = 'test@example.com';
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT first_name, email FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'dark';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_info WHERE user_id = 1001 AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM interactions WHERE user_id = 2002 ORDER BY interaction_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, language FROM user_preferences WHERE theme = 'light' AND language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, theme FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, difficulty_level FROM learning_resources WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE language = 'English' AND theme = 'Dark';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM interactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type IN ('Video', 'Article') AND difficulty_level > 3 ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, country FROM user_profiles ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT user_id, subject, level FROM user_preferences WHERE level = 'Intermediate';
SELECT material_id, subject, material_url FROM learning_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, name, country FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'male' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT u.name, u.age, p.subject FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.level = 'Beginner';
SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id, u.name, i.interaction_type FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_interactions i ON u.user_id = i.user_id WHERE i.duration > 60;
SELECT u.name, l.material_url FROM user_profiles u JOIN user_progress pr ON u.user_id = pr.user_id JOIN learning_materials l ON pr.material_id = l.material_id WHERE pr.progress_percentage >= 50;
